items.name: static var bottomField: CVTimeStampFlags
items.desc: The timestamp represents the bottom lines of an interlaced image.

items.name: static var hostTimeValid: CVTimeStampFlags
items.desc: The value in the host time field is valid.

items.name: static var isInterlaced: CVTimeStampFlags
items.desc: A convenience constant indicating that the timestamp is for an interlaced image.

items.name: static var rateScalarValid: CVTimeStampFlags
items.desc: The value in the rate scalar field is valid.

items.name: static var smpteTimeValid: CVTimeStampFlags
items.desc: The value in the SMPTE time field is valid.

items.name: static var topField: CVTimeStampFlags
items.desc: The timestamp represents the top lines of an interlaced image.

items.name: static var videoHostTimeValid: CVTimeStampFlags
items.desc: A convenience constant indicating that both the video time and host time fields are valid.

items.name: static var videoRefreshPeriodValid: CVTimeStampFlags
items.desc: The value in the video refresh period field is valid.

items.name: static var videoTimeValid: CVTimeStampFlags
items.desc: The value in the video time field is valid.
